synopsis: Anzu has just transferred to Yumenosaki Academy, but since the production department is under development, she has to take classes with the all-boys' idol department.
Various groups recruit Anzu to be their producer, and Trickstar shows their stuff to convince her to join them.
Trickstar is finally able to practice together, but they need to pull out all the stops if they're going to beat AKATSUKI.
Trickstar is up against AKATSUKI for the S1, but UNDEAD's leader has a trick up his sleeve...
Nazuna looks back on his time with Valkyrie and the events that took place during last year's DreFes.
Valkyrie has to deal with a new reality as DreFes and Eichi Tenshouin's unit, fine, takes over Yumenosaki Academy.
The members of Trickstar are summoned to the student council to discuss their future.
Subaru struggles with whether or not he wants to continue with Trickstar as the DDD approaches.
As the Trickstar members struggle with their futures, the other units work together to help defeat fine.
One year ago, everything about Yumenosaki Academy was different from what it is now...
The Five Eccentrics have new roles to play as Yumenosaki Academy comes under the rule of Eichi Tenshouin.
It's almost time for Trickstar to perform in the DDD final, but they still don't know where Hokuto is...
Chiaki works to develop a new proposal for RYUSEITAI to perform at a theme park.
Eichi asks Anzu to start a surprising new project, and Switch works toward their debut.
Preparations for the Tanabata Festival are underway, and Eichi approaches Valkyrie about entering this Drefes.
Trickstar meets students from their rival school, Reimei Academy, to get ready for the upcoming Summer Live.
Trickstar is ready for their joint Summer Live with Eve, but why is Makoto feeling uneasy about it?
Leo has returned, but not everybody in Knights is happy about having him back.
A strange invitation from Shuetsu Academy takes Trickstar to meet Eden’s other half.
The Autumn Live against Adam draws closer, and the members of Trickstar individually prepare for the concert.
Yumenosaki Academy’s idols get into costume for the Halloween Party DreFes.
